text:
Central Siam Cuisine offers a simple and comfortable Thai dining environment. The waitress was friendly and efficient, although there was a slight wait for the food.

The boat noodles featured a rich and flavorful broth with tender meat and well-cooked noodles.

The crab meat omelette rice was also enjoyable, with a fluffy omelette containing a generous amount of sweet crab meat served over fragrant rice.

Overall, Central Siam Cuisine is a good choice for straightforward and tasty Thai food.

The food here is absolutely fantastic! Each dish offers an authentic Thai flavor, and you can truly taste the freshness of the ingredients. Every bite feels like a genuine taste of Thailand. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back for more!

Average taste. Crab portion was too little for $14. Didn't stock up on 100 plus or Sprite canned drinks although they're on the menu. Had to order minimum of 2 mini boat noodles. They offered a free item for giving Google reviews which might explain the high ratings
the foods are really delicious and fresh. love their special thai pink milk tea. will come back again definitely. ‚ô•Ô∏èüíï

the spice level here for all their dishes is legit, mega love the chilli that comes with the creamy omelette, the chilli in the kangkong, the kick of the tomyum soup. so refreshing to finally find a thai place that can deliver a level of spice that is not tamed down to nothing. definitely will return to try the other dishes!
